title: Solar Farm Site Feasibility Analysis
description: An agent must assess a potential land parcel for its suitability for a new utility-scale solar farm.

tasks.description: Analyze solar irradiance and weather data for the specified coordinates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides average annual GHI/DNI values and identifies any significant weather risks.

tasks.description: Check for grid interconnection points within a 10km radius and their available capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the nearest substation and its current load and capacity data.

tasks.description: Review land topography and environmental zoning restrictions for the parcel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the land is not in a protected zone and has a suitable slope.

tasks.description: Generate a preliminary feasibility report summarizing findings and recommending next steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a structured report with a clear recommendation.
